ecksdee.shapes

Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • ecksdee.shapes.Shape
      • ecksdee.shapes.Line

  • public class Line
extends Shape
    models a line based on 2 endpoints.
    Author:
    Johnry

      • Line

        public Line(double x1,
            double y1,
            double x2,
            double y2)
        creates a line that has endpoints (x1,y1) and (x2,y2)
        Parameters:
        x1 - x value for endpoint one
        y1 - y value for endpoint one
        x2 - x value for endpoint two
        y2 - y value for endpoint two

      • Line

        public Line(double x1,
            double y1,
            double x2,
            double y2,
            java.awt.Color stroke,
            java.awt.Color fill,
            int width)
        makes a very customized line
        Parameters:
        x1 - start x coord
        y1 - start y coord
        x2 - second x coord
        y2 - second y coord
        stroke - stroke color of type java.awt.Color
        fill - fill color of type java.awt.Color
        width - strokeWeight of object

        y1 - start y coord
        angle - angle above line x= 0
        length - length of line
        stroke - stroke color of type java.awt.Color
        fill - fill color of type java.awt.Color
        width - strokeWeight of object
